member.name: T:UserControlLibrary.App_Controls.UserControls.ArubaDynamicAddRemoveControl
member.summary: This is a basic user control which is then added to ArubaDynamicAddRemoveControlCollection user control. This control exposes required properties of the text boxes and events for Insert and Remove buttons. Maximum 4 text boxes can be displyed inline using this control. The control contains a set of text boxes, an Insert and a Remove button. Clicking Insert button adds an instance of this control to the existing collection. Remove button removes the respective control from the existing collection.

member.name: T:UserControlLibrary.App_Controls.UserControls.ArubaDynamicAddRemoveControlCollection
member.summary:
This is a collection or container user control which can contain one or more ArubaDynamicAddRemoveControl user control. This control exposes required properties of the text boxes and implements events for Insert and Remove buttons.
This control encapsulates the basic ArubaDynamicAddRemoveControl and it's events. It adds and removes the ArubaDynamicAddRemoveControl control based on the user request. Also, it exposes some public properties and methods that help getting all the added controls and their values on the aspx
The control contains only a place holder conrol. On each Insert event, an instance of ArubaDynamicAddRemoveControl user control is added to this place holder. On Remove event, the respective control is removed from the collection.
member.remarks: Auto-generated class.

member.name: M:UserControlLibrary.App_Controls.UserControls.DisplayMLEntry.SetColumnControlType(BusinessObjects.ViewGetColumnSchemaCollection)
member.param: Instance of containing the Column Details based on the Table Name
member.remarks:
If Language selected from dropdown and are Same and Control Type from View passed is "TEXTEDITOR" then,
Column Display Name is Set in Value of "hdSetControlType"
Else If Control Type is "TEXTEDITOR" or "MULTILINETEXTBOX" then
Column Display Name, ML Column Display Name is Set in Value of "hdSetControlType"

member.name: M:UserControlLibrary.App_Controls.UserControls.DisplayMLEntry.LoadGridByTableName
member.summary: Loads the Grid with ML Data based on the Table Name and the Language Selected

item.term: Gets the Current Table Name, Primary Key (), Child Table Name (ML Table), Master Field Name (FieldName of the Master Table)

If Language Selected in drop down and are not same then,
Gets Foreign Key (), Child Field Name(Fields of ML Table)
Generates the Query for Selection of ML Data in a DataTable based on the above criteria alongwith Provider ID and BusinessProfile ID
Binds the DataTable with Grid for ML Data List if 1 or more rows are returned, Otherwise NULL is bind with Grid
